Uses of Package
org.gjt.sp.jedit.bufferset

  • Packages that use org.gjt.sp.jedit.bufferset 
    Package Description
    org.gjt.sp.jedit
    This package contains jEdit 4's core classes.
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.bufferset
    Classes related to implementation of the BufferSets feature of jEdit.
  • Classes in org.gjt.sp.jedit.bufferset used by org.gjt.sp.jedit 
    Class Description
    BufferSet
    An ordered list of buffers, normally attached to an EditPane and viewed in a BufferSwitcher.
    BufferSetListener
    This is the listener for the BufferSet changes.
    BufferSetManager
    The buffersets manager.
  • Classes in org.gjt.sp.jedit.bufferset used by org.gjt.sp.jedit.bufferset 
    Class Description
    BufferSet
    An ordered list of buffers, normally attached to an EditPane and viewed in a BufferSwitcher.
    BufferSet.Scope
    Possible scopes for BufferSets.
    BufferSetListener
    This is the listener for the BufferSet changes.
